job.name: TpcRS
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO # unsetenv DEBUG yes # setup debug # setup 64b # starver .DEV2 # starver TFG17j # starver TFG19e # starver .DEV2 source $STAR/unsetupDEV2.csh setup 32b starver SL20d limit stacksize 16m set file = $INPUTFILE0; # set rung = `echo $file | awk -F\_ '{print $2}'` echo "${file}" set fileB = `basename ${file} .MuDst.root`; set logFile = ${fileB}B.log set Name = `basename $PWD` # set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${fileB}*.root"` # if ("$f" == "") then ls -l *${fileB}*.root if (! $?) exit 0; # root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(500,"mtin,MC.2019,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,NoHistos,noRunco","'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} root4star -q -b 'bfc.C(500,"mtin,y2019,TpcRS,TpxClu,useXgeom,NoSsdIt,NoSvtIt,Idst,BAna,VFMinuit,tpcDB,TpcHitMover,bbcSim,btofsim,btofMatch,btofCalib,tags,emcY2,evout,IdTruth,geantout,big,MiniMcMk,Sti,AgML,TpcRS,StiCA,-geantOut","'${file}'")' >& ${logFile}
